砲烟: (ほうえん) - gunsmoke; smoke of cannon

砲艦外交: (ほうかんがいこう) - gunboat diplomacy
砲音: (ほうおん) - roar of a cannon
破: (ha/yabu) - rend , (in gagaku or noh) middle section of a song
破く: (やぶく) - to tear; to violate; to defeat; to smash; to destroy
破ける: (やぶける) - to get torn; to wear out; to be frustrated; to break
破り: (やぶり) - getting away from; escaping; defying
破り取る: (やぶりとる) - rip out (and take); tear out (from)
破り子: (わりご) - partitioned lidded wooden lunchbox; food served in such a box
破り籠: (わりご) - partitioned lidded wooden lunchbox; food served in such a box
破る: (やぶる) - to tear/to break/to destroy; to break through (opponent's defense etc.)/to breach; to defeat/to beat; to shatter (dream, peace, etc.)/to disturb; to violate (a rule etc.)/to break (a promise etc.); to break (a record)
破れる: (やぶれる) - to get torn/to tear/to rip/to break/to wear out; to be broken off (of negotiations, etc.)/to break down/to collapse/to fall into ruin
破れ傘: (ヤブレガサ) - broken umbrella/torn umbrella; shredded umbrella plant (Syneilesis palmata)
破れ物: (われもの) - fragile item; broken article
破れ鍋に綴じ蓋: (われなべにとじぶた) - (proverb) there is a suitable spouse for everyone; every Jack has his Jill; a mended lid for a cracked pot
破れ鐘のような声: (われがねのようなこえ) - resounding voice; thunderous voice
破体: (はたい) - in calligraphy, an abbreviated or mistaken form of a character, or a work written in more than one calligraphic style
破傷風トキソイド: (はしょうふうトキソイド) - tetanus toxoid
破傷風抗毒素: (はしょうふうこうどくそ) - {med} tetanus antitoxin
破傷風菌: (はしょうふうきん) - Clostridium tetani (tetanus bacillus)
破壊分子: (はかいぶんし) - (yoji) subversive; subversive element
破壊力: (はかいりょく) - destructive power; destructive energy; destructive force
破壊措置命令: (はかいそちめいれい) - shoot-down order (e.g. for ballistic missile)
破壊活動防止法: (はかいかつどうぼうしほう) - (Japanese) Anti-Subversive Activities Act
破壊的読み取り: (はかいてきよみとり) - destructive read
破天連: (バテレン) - Portuguese Jesuits (in Japan in the 16th century) (por: padre); Christianity/Christian
破婚: (はこん) - marriage breakup; divorce; engagement breakup
破子: (わりご) - partitioned lidded wooden lunchbox; food served in such a box
破家: (バカ) - fool/idiot; trivial matter/folly/absurdity; foolish/stupid/dull/absurd/ridiculous; Mactra chinensis (species of trough shell)
破局: (はきょく) - catastrophe; cataclysm; collapse (of a relationship); breakup; split (friends, lovers, etc.)
破廉恥漢: (はれんちかん) - (yoji) shameless man; knave
破廉恥罪: (はれんちざい) - (yoji) infamous crime or offense (offence)
破恋: (はれん) - disappointed love; broken heart; unrequited love; being lovelorn
破戒: (はかい) - breaking a commandment (usually religious); offense against the Buddhist commandments (offence)
破戒僧: (はかいそう) - depraved monk; sinful priest
破摧: (はさい) - crushing; smashing; cracking to pieces
破棄: (haki) - tearing up and discarding (por exemplo, documentos), disposal (e.g. weaponry), destruction; annulment, cancellation, abrogation, voiding, breaking (e.g. treaty) , tearing up and discarding (e.g. documents), disposal (e.g. weaponry), destruction; annulment, cancellation, abrogation, voiding, breaking (e.g. treaty); reversal (of an original ruling)
破毀: (はき) - tearing up and discarding (e.g. documents); disposal (e.g. weaponry); revocation; annulment; breaking (e.g. treaty); reversing (e.g. an original judgment) (judgement); discard; cancellation; repeal
破物: (われもの) - fragile item; broken article

破産法: (はさんほう) - bankruptcy act or laws
破産申請: (はさんしんせい) - petition for bankruptcy
破産管財人: (はさんかんざいにん) - trustee or administrator in bankruptcy
破産者: (はさんしゃ) - bankrupt person; insolvent person
